00099           }

00102           {
00103           $Res=ExecSql($cn,"update priv_user set priv_priv='".$elem."' where priv_jnt=".$jnt);

00105            $Res=ExecSql($cn,"insert into  priv_user(priv_jnt,priv_priv) values (".$jnt.",'".$elem."')");
00106           }
